title: Struc. Adjustment lowers both govt spending and...

content.question: Which of the following accurately describes two main components of structural adjustment programs?

choices.label: A reduction in government spending and the lowering of import tariffs
An increase in taxes on corporations and redistribution of income
An increase in employment and the minimum wage through spending on public works
Nationalization of major industries and a decrease in interest rates
A reduction of foreign investment and the institution of a flat tax

content.answer: A reduction in government spending and the lowering of import tariffs

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
